spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room placement and adjacency. Minor issues: The kitchen island/counter is truncated compared to the 2D plan, and the exterior door in the hallway is missing its threshold structure.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof is correctly removed and all rooms are present. No text labels or UI elements as required. Slightly Deducted for the missing hallway entrance floor transition/step depicted in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block-style furniture mirrors the plan accurately. Sofa and bed configurations are spot on. A slight deduction for the kitchen cabinetry being less cohesive than the U-shape indicated.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly, flat shading, isometric orthographic view, and a dark neutral background with no photorealistic textures.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen counter lacks the full extension/U-shape return shown in the 2D plan.
Hallway entrance door slightly simplified, missing the exterior floor pad detail.
